systemData.description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

createdBy.description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedAt.description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)

properties.description: properties for Arc-enabled edge device with HCI OS.

kind.description: Metadata used by portal/tooling/etc to render different UX experiences for resources of the same type; e.g. ApiApps are a kind of Microsoft.Web/sites type.  If supported, the resource provider must validate and persist this value.

reportedProperties.description: The instance view of all current configurations on HCI device.

sbeDeploymentPackageInfo.description: Solution builder extension (SBE) deployment package information.

lastSyncTimestamp.description: Most recent edge device sync timestamp in UTC.

confidentialVmProfile.description: CVM support details for edge device.

nicDetails.description: List of NIC Details of device.

switchDetails.description: List of switch details for edge device.

hostNetwork.description: HostNetwork config to deploy AzureStackHCI Cluster.

sdnProperties.description: oftware Defined Networking Properties of the cluster

slot.description: The slot attached to the NIC.

switchName.description: The switch attached to the NIC, if any.

nicType.description: The type of NIC, physical, virtual, management.

vlanId.description: The VLAN ID of the physical NIC.

nicStatus.description: The status of NIC, up, disconnected.

rdmaCapability.description: Describes the RDMA capability of the network adapter.

switchType.description: The type of the switch. e.g. external, internal.

extensions.description: This represents extensions installed on virtualSwitch.

extensionName.description: This will show extension name for virtualSwitch.

extensionEnabled.description: This represents whether extension is enabled on virtualSwitch.

intents.description: The network intents assigned to the network reference pattern used for the deployment. Each intent will define its own name, traffic type, adapter names, and overrides as recommended by your OEM.

storageNetworks.description: List of StorageNetworks config to deploy AzureStackHCI Cluster.

storageConnectivitySwitchless.description: Defines how the storage adapters between nodes are connected either switch or switch less.

enableStorageAutoIp.description: Optional parameter required only for 3 Nodes Switchless deployments. This allows users to specify IPs and Mask for Storage NICs when Network ATC is not assigning the IPs for storage automatically.

intentName.description: Name of the network intent you wish to create.

intentAdapters.description: Array of adapters used for the network intent.

overrideVirtualSwitchConfiguration.description: This parameter should only be modified based on your OEM guidance. Do not modify this parameter without OEM validation.

overrideQosPolicy.description: This parameter should only be modified based on your OEM guidance. Do not modify this parameter without OEM validation.

overrideAdapterProperty.description: This parameter should only be modified based on your OEM guidance. Do not modify this parameter without OEM validation.

loadBalancingAlgorithm.description: Load Balancing Algorithm for Virtual Switch

priorityValue8021Action_Cluster.description: This parameter should only be modified based on your OEM guidance. Do not modify this parameter without OEM validation.

priorityValue8021Action_SMB.description: This parameter should only be modified based on your OEM guidance. Do not modify this parameter without OEM validation.

bandwidthPercentage_SMB.description: This parameter should only be modified based on your OEM guidance. Do not modify this parameter without OEM validation.

jumboPacket.description: This parameter should only be modified based on your OEM guidance. Do not modify this parameter without OEM validation.

networkDirect.description: This parameter should only be modified based on your OEM guidance. Do not modify this parameter without OEM validation.

networkDirectTechnology.description: This parameter should only be modified based on your OEM guidance. Do not modify this parameter without OEM validation. Expected values are 'iWARP', 'RoCEv2', 'RoCE'

networkAdapterName.description: Name of the storage network adapter.

storageVlanId.description: ID specified for the VLAN storage network. This setting is applied to the network interfaces that route the storage and VM migration traffic.

storageAdapterIPInfo.description: List of Storage adapter physical nodes config to deploy AzureStackHCI Cluster.

ipv4Address.description: The IPv4 address assigned to each storage adapter physical node on your Azure Stack HCI cluster.

subnetMask.description: The SubnetMask address assigned to each storage adapter physical node on your Azure Stack HCI cluster.

sdnStatus.description: Indicates the current Software Defined Networking (SDN) status of the resource, which may be an individual device or a cluster.

sdnDomainName.description: The fully qualified domain name (FQDN) associated with the SDN deployment. This value is propagated from the Device Management Extension to the cluster resource. It is typically in the format `<sdnPrefix>-nc.<domain>` when SDN is enabled. May be null or absent in unsupported or disabled states.

sdnApiAddress.description: Represents the API address for the SDN deployment.

bootType.description: The boot type of the device. e.g. UEFI, Legacy etc

assemblyVersion.description: Version of assembly present on device

message.description: A detailed message that explains the SBE package validation result.

sbeManifest.description: This represents discovered update results for matching updates and store it as SBE manifest.

poolableDisksCount.description: Number of storage disks in the device with $CanPool as true.

extensions.description: List of Arc extensions installed on edge device.

extensionName.description: Arc extension name installed on edge device.

state.description: Arc extension state from arc machine extension.

errorDetails.description: Error details while installing Arc extension.

managedBy.description: Indicates whether the extension is managed by the user or by Azure.

igvmStatus.description: Indicates whether Independent Guest Virtual Machine (IGVM) support is available on the device. This will be 'Enabled' if the device supports CVMs, 'Disabled' if not, and 'Unknown' if the status cannot be determined.

statusDetails.description: Provides detailed status entries for IGVM-related components, including deployment status, compatibility checks, and error diagnostics.

code.description: A machine-readable status code indicating the result or condition of a specific IGVM-related check or operation.

message.description: A human-readable message providing context or explanation for the associated status code.

endTimeUtc.description: The UTC date and time at which the job completed.

jobType.description: Job Type to support polymorphic resource.

percentComplete.description: The percentage of the job that is complete.

logCollectionSessionDetails.description: Details of the log collection session.

status.description: Status of ECE action AzureStackHCI Cluster Deployment.

steps.description: List of steps of AzureStackHCI Cluster Deployment.

status.description: Status of step. Allowed values are 'Error', 'Success', 'InProgress'

steps.description: List of nested steps of AzureStackHCI Cluster Deployment.

exception.description: List of exceptions in AzureStackHCI Cluster Deployment.

startTime.description: The timestamp when log collection started, in ISO 8601 format.

endTime.description: The timestamp when log collection ended, in ISO 8601 format.

timeCollected.description: The total time logs were collected for, in ISO 8601 duration format.

logSize.description: The size of the collected logs in bytes.

status.description: The status of the log collection session.

correlationId.description: A unique identifier for correlating this log collection session with other operations or sessions.

jobType.description: Job Type to support polymorphic resource.

percentComplete.description: The percentage of the job that is complete.

nodeSettings.description: Optional settings for configuring the node for remote support.

sessionDetails.description: Details of the remote support session.

state.description: The state of the remote support node.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the node settings were created, in UTC.

updatedAt.description: The timestamp when the node settings were last updated, in UTC.

connectionStatus.description: The current connection status of the remote support session.

connectionErrorMessage.description: The error message, if any, from the last connection attempt.

sessionStartTime.description: The start time of the remote support session, in UTC.

sessionEndTime.description: The end time of the remote support session, in UTC.

accessLevel.description: The level of access granted during the remote support session.

transcriptLocation.description: The location where the session transcript is stored.

identity.description: The managed service identities assigned to this resource.

kind.description: This property identifies the purpose of the Cluster deployment. For example, a valid value is AzureLocal

location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

provisioningState.description: Provisioning state. Indicates the current lifecycle status of the resource, including creation, update, deletion, connectivity, and error states.

status.description: Status of the cluster agent. Indicates the current connectivity, validation, and deployment state of the agent within the cluster.

connectivityStatus.description: Overall connectivity status for the cluster resource. Indicates whether the cluster is connected to Azure, partially connected, or has not recently communicated.

ring.description: The ring to which this cluster belongs to.

cloudManagementEndpoint.description: Endpoint configured for management from the Azure portal.

aadClientId.description: App id of cluster AAD identity.

aadTenantId.description: Tenant id of cluster AAD identity.

aadApplicationObjectId.description: Object id of cluster AAD identity.

aadServicePrincipalObjectId.description: Id of cluster identity service principal.

softwareAssuranceProperties.description: Software Assurance properties of the cluster.

isManagementCluster.description: Is Management Cluster, when true indicates that the cluster is used for managing other clusters

logCollectionProperties.description: Log Collection properties of the cluster.

isolatedVmAttestationConfiguration.description: Attestation configurations for isolated VM (e.g. TVM, CVM) of the cluster.

trialDaysRemaining.description: Number of days remaining in the trial period.

billingModel.description: Type of billing applied to the resource.

serviceEndpoint.description: Region specific DataPath Endpoint of the cluster.

resourceProviderObjectId.description: Object id of RP Service Principal

clusterPattern.description: Supported Storage Type for HCI Cluster

confidentialVmProperties.description: Represents the Confidential Virtual Machine (CVM) support intent and current status for the cluster resource.

softwareAssuranceStatus.description: Status of the Software Assurance for the cluster.

lastUpdated.description: TimeStamp denoting the latest SA benefit applicability is validated.

fromDate.description: From DateTimeStamp from when logs need to be connected

toDate.description: To DateTimeStamp till when logs need to be connected

logStartTime.description: Start Time of the logs when it was collected

logEndTime.description: End Time of the logs when it was collected

errorCode.description: Error Code of the log collection

diagnosticLevel.description: Desired level of diagnostic data emitted by the cluster.

nodes.description: List of nodes reported by the cluster.

msiExpirationTimeStamp.description: Specifies the expiration timestamp of the cluster's Managed Service Identity (MSI). The value is expressed in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

imdsAttestation.description: IMDS attestation status of the cluster.

diagnosticLevel.description: Level of diagnostic data emitted by the cluster.

clusterType.description: Specifies the type of hardware vendor for all nodes in the cluster. Indicates whether the nodes are provided by Microsoft or a third-party vendor.

manufacturer.description: The manufacturer of all the nodes of the cluster.

oemActivation.description: OEM activation status of the cluster.

id.description: Id of the node in the cluster.

model.description: Model name of the cluster node hardware.

osName.description: Operating system running on the cluster node.

osVersion.description: Version of the operating system running on the cluster node.

osDisplayVersion.description: Display version of the operating system running on the cluster node.

serialNumber.description: Immutable id of the cluster node.

coreCount.description: Number of physical cores on the cluster node.

memoryInGiB.description: Total available memory on the cluster node (in GiB).

oemActivation.description: OEM activation status of the node.

attestationResourceId.description: Fully qualified Azure resource id of the Microsoft Azure attestation resource associated with this cluster.

relyingPartyServiceEndpoint.description: Region specific endpoint for relying party service.

attestationServiceEndpoint.description: Region specific endpoint for Microsoft Azure Attestation service for the cluster

confidentialVmIntent.description: Captures the customer's intent to enable or disable CVM support on the cluster, either during initial deployment (Day-0) or at a later stage (Day-N).

confidentialVmStatus.description: Captures the current status of CVM support on the cluster.

confidentialVmStatusSummary.description: Additional context about CVM support on the cluster, such as reasons for partial enablement or hardware constraints.

sdnIntegrationIntent.description: Indicates whether Software Defined Networking (SDN) integration should be enabled or disabled for this deployment.

sdnStatus.description: Indicates the current Software Defined Networking (SDN) status of the resource, which may be an individual device or a cluster.

sdnDomainName.description: The fully qualified domain name (FQDN) associated with the SDN deployment. This value is propagated from the Device Management Extension to the cluster resource. It is typically in the format `<sdnPrefix>-nc.<domain>` when SDN is enabled. May be null or absent in unsupported or disabled states.

nodes.description: Nodes belonging to a particular zone

principalId.description: The service principal ID of the system assigned identity. This property will only be provided for a system assigned identity.

tenantId.description: The tenant ID of the system assigned identity. This property will only be provided for a system assigned identity.

type.description: Type of managed service identity (where both SystemAssigned and UserAssigned types are allowed).

userAssignedIdentities.description: The set of user assigned identities associated with the resource. The userAssignedIdentities dictionary keys will be ARM resource ids in the form: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/{identityName}. The dictionary values can be empty objects ({}) in requests.

arcNodeServicePrincipalObjectId.description: The service principal id of the arc for server node

state.description: State of the Arc agent in this node. Indicates the current lifecycle status of the agent, such as whether it's being provisioned, connected, updated, or has encountered an error.

enabled.description: True indicates ARC connectivity is enabled

serviceConfigurations.description: Service configurations associated with the connectivity resource. They are only processed by the server if 'enabled' property is set to 'true'.

serviceName.description: Specifies the name of the service associated with the update or operation. This helps identify which system component or tool is involved.

port.description: The port on which service is enabled.

properties.description: Describes Machine Extension Properties.

provisioningState.description: Provisioning state of the Extension proxy resource. Indicates the current lifecycle status of the resource, such as whether it's being created, updated, deleted, or has encountered an error.

extensionParameters.description: Parameters specific to this extension type.

aggregateState.description: Aggregate state of Arc Extensions across the nodes in this HCI cluster. This reflects the overall status of the extension deployment and operation across all nodes.

perNodeExtensionDetails.description: State of Arc Extension in each of the nodes.

managedBy.description: Indicates if the extension is managed by Azure or the user. This determines who controls the deployment and lifecycle of the extension.

forceUpdateTag.description: How the extension handler should be forced to update even if the extension configuration has not changed.

publisher.description: The name of the extension handler publisher.

type.description: Specifies the type of the extension; an example is "CustomScriptExtension".

typeHandlerVersion.description: Specifies the version of the script handler. Latest version would be used if not specified.

autoUpgradeMinorVersion.description: Indicates whether the extension should use a newer minor version if one is available at deployment time. Once deployed, however, the extension will not upgrade minor versions unless redeployed, even with this property set to true.

settings.description: Json formatted public settings for the extension.

enableAutomaticUpgrade.description: Indicates whether the extension should be automatically upgraded by the platform if there is a newer version available.

name.description: Name of the node in HCI Cluster.

extension.description: Fully qualified resource ID for the particular Arc Extension on this node.

typeHandlerVersion.description: Specifies the version of the script handler.

state.description: State of Arc Extension in this node. Reflects the current lifecycle status of the extension on the individual node, such as whether it's being created, updated, deleted, or has encountered an error.

type.description: Specifies the type of the extension; an example is "MicrosoftMonitoringAgent".

typeHandlerVersion.description: Specifies the version of the script handler.

level.description: The level code. Indicates the severity or importance of the status message.

displayStatus.description: The short localizable label for the status.

message.description: The detailed status message, including for alerts and error messages.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

arcNodeResourceIds.description: Azure resource ids of Arc machines to be part of cluster.

deploymentMode.description: The deployment mode for cluster deployment.

operationType.description: The intended operation for a cluster.

deploymentConfiguration.description: Scale units will contains list of deployment data

scaleUnits.description: Scale units will contains list of deployment data

deploymentData.description: Deployment Data to deploy AzureStackHCI Cluster.

observability.description: Observability config to deploy AzureStackHCI Cluster.

cluster.description: Observability config to deploy AzureStackHCI Cluster.

storage.description: Storage config to deploy AzureStackHCI Cluster.

infrastructureNetwork.description: InfrastructureNetwork config to deploy AzureStackHCI Cluster.

physicalNodes.description: list of physical nodes config to deploy AzureStackHCI Cluster.

hostNetwork.description: HostNetwork config to deploy AzureStackHCI Cluster.

sdnIntegration.description: SDN Integration config to deploy AzureStackHCI Cluster.

isManagementCluster.description: Is Management Cluster, when true indicates that the cluster is used for managing other clusters

adouPath.description: The path to the Active Directory Organizational Unit container object prepared for the deployment.

secretsLocation.description: Azure key vault endpoint. This property is deprecated from 2023-12-01-preview. Please use secrets property instead.

optionalServices.description: OptionalServices config to deploy AzureStackHCI Cluster.

localAvailabilityZones.description: Local Availability Zone information for HCI cluster

assemblyInfo.description: Assembly Package details for Validated Solution Recipe for AzureStackHCI Cluster

hvciProtection.description: By default, Hypervisor-protected Code Integrity is enabled on your Azure HCI cluster.

drtmProtection.description: By default, Secure Boot is enabled on your Azure HCI cluster. This setting is hardware dependent.

driftControlEnforced.description: When set to true, the security baseline is re-applied regularly.

credentialGuardEnforced.description: When set to true, Credential Guard is enabled.

smbSigningEnforced.description: When set to true, the SMB default instance requires sign in for the client and server services.

smbClusterEncryption.description: When set to true, cluster east-west traffic is encrypted.

sideChannelMitigationEnforced.description: When set to true, all the side channel mitigations are enabled

bitlockerBootVolume.description: When set to true, BitLocker XTS_AES 256-bit encryption is enabled for all data-at-rest on the OS volume of your Azure Stack HCI cluster. This setting is TPM-hardware dependent.

bitlockerDataVolumes.description: When set to true, BitLocker XTS-AES 256-bit encryption is enabled for all data-at-rest on your Azure Stack HCI cluster shared volumes.

wdacEnforced.description: WDAC is enabled by default and limits the applications and the code that you can run on your Azure Stack HCI cluster.

streamingDataClient.description: Enables telemetry data to be sent to Microsoft

euLocation.description: Location of your cluster. The log and diagnostic data is sent to the appropriate diagnostics servers depending upon where your cluster resides. Setting this to false results in all data sent to Microsoft to be stored outside of the EU.

episodicDataUpload.description: When set to true, collects log data to facilitate quicker issue resolution.

name.description: The cluster name provided when preparing Active Directory.

witnessType.description: Use a cloud witness if you have internet access and if you use an Azure Storage account to provide a vote on cluster quorum. A cloud witness uses Azure Blob Storage to read or write a blob file and then uses it to arbitrate in split-brain resolution. Only allowed values are 'Cloud', 'FileShare'.

witnessPath.description: Specify the fileshare path for the local witness for your Azure Stack HCI cluster.

cloudAccountName.description: Specify the Azure Storage account name for cloud witness for your Azure Stack HCI cluster.

azureServiceEndpoint.description: For Azure blob service endpoint type, select either Default or Custom domain. If you selected **Custom domain, enter the domain for the blob service in this format core.windows.net.

configurationMode.description: By default, this mode is set to Express and your storage is configured as per best practices based on the number of nodes in the cluster. Allowed values are 'Express','InfraOnly', 'KeepStorage'

subnetMask.description: Subnet mask that matches the provided IP address space.

gateway.description: Default gateway that should be used for the provided IP address space.

ipPools.description: Range of IP addresses from which addresses are allocated for nodes within a subnet.

dnsServerConfig.description: Specifies how DNS servers are configured for the infrastructure network. Allowed values are 'UseDnsServer' to use the provided DNS servers, and 'UseForwarder' to use DNS forwarders.

dnsZones.description: Details of the DNS Zones to be configured.

dnsServers.description: IPv4 address of the DNS servers in your environment.

useDhcp.description: Allows customers to use DHCP for Hosts and Cluster IPs. If not declared, the deployment will default to static IPs. When true, GW and DNS servers are not required

startingAddress.description: Starting IP address for the management network. A minimum of six free, contiguous IPv4 addresses (excluding your host IPs) are needed for infrastructure services such as clustering.

endingAddress.description: Ending IP address for the management network. A minimum of six free, contiguous IPv4 addresses (excluding your host IPs) are needed for infrastructure services such as clustering.

dnsZoneName.description: Name of the DNS Zone to be configured.

dnsForwarder.description: Forwarder details of the DNS Zone to be configured.

name.description: NETBIOS name of each physical server on your Azure Stack HCI cluster.

ipv4Address.description: The IPv4 address assigned to each physical server on your Azure Stack HCI cluster.

intents.description: The network intents assigned to the network reference pattern used for the deployment. Each intent will define its own name, traffic type, adapter names, and overrides as recommended by your OEM.

storageNetworks.description: List of StorageNetworks config to deploy AzureStackHCI Cluster.

storageConnectivitySwitchless.description: Defines how the storage adapters between nodes are connected either switch or switch less..

enableStorageAutoIp.description: Optional parameter required only for 3 Nodes Switchless deployments. This allows users to specify IPs and Mask for Storage NICs when Network ATC is not assigning the IPs for storage automatically.

name.description: Name of the network intent you wish to create.

trafficType.description: List of network traffic types. Only allowed values are 'Compute', 'Storage', 'Management'.

adapter.description: Array of network interfaces used for the network intent.

overrideVirtualSwitchConfiguration.description: This parameter should only be modified based on your OEM guidance. Do not modify this parameter without OEM validation.

overrideQosPolicy.description: This parameter should only be modified based on your OEM guidance. Do not modify this parameter without OEM validation.

overrideAdapterProperty.description: This parameter should only be modified based on your OEM guidance. Do not modify this parameter without OEM validation.

loadBalancingAlgorithm.description: Load Balancing Algorithm for Virtual Switch

jumboPacket.description: This parameter should only be modified based on your OEM guidance. Do not modify this parameter without OEM validation.

networkDirect.description: This parameter should only be modified based on your OEM guidance. Do not modify this parameter without OEM validation.

networkDirectTechnology.description: This parameter should only be modified based on your OEM guidance. Do not modify this parameter without OEM validation. Expected values are 'iWARP', 'RoCEv2', 'RoCE'

networkAdapterName.description: Name of the storage network adapter.

vlanId.description: ID specified for the VLAN storage network. This setting is applied to the network interfaces that route the storage and VM migration traffic.

storageAdapterIPInfo.description: List of Storage adapter physical nodes config to deploy AzureStackHCI Cluster.

ipv4Address.description: The IPv4 address assigned to each storage adapter physical node on your Azure Stack HCI cluster.

subnetMask.description: The SubnetMask address assigned to each storage adapter physical node on your Azure Stack HCI cluster.

credentialList.description: SBE credentials list for AzureStackHCI cluster deployment.

eceSecretName.description: secret name expected for Enterprise Cloud Engine (ECE).

validationStatus.description: validation status of AzureStackHCI Cluster Deployment.

deploymentStatus.description: Deployment status of AzureStackHCI Cluster Deployment.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

systemData.description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

startTimeUtc.description: The UTC date and time at which the job started.

endTimeUtc.description: The UTC date and time at which the job completed.

percentComplete.description: The percentage of the job that is complete.

confidentialVmIntent.description: Defines the customer's intent for updating confidential VM properties

jobType.description: Job Type to support polymorphic resource.

sdnIntegrationIntent.description: Defines the customer's intent for configuring SDN integration

sdnPrefix.description: A string identifier used to construct the Network Controller (NC) REST resource name. This prefix helps group and distinguish SDN-managed network components and must follow specific formatting rules.

jobType.description: Job Type to support polymorphic resource.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

systemData.description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

smbEncryptionForIntraClusterTrafficCompl.description: SMB encryption for intra-cluster traffic Compliance Assignment

provisioningState.description: The status of the last operation.

securedCoreCompliance.description: Indicates whether HCI hosts meets secured-core server requirements.

wdacCompliance.description: Indicates whether HCI hosts have enforced consistent Windows Defender Application Control.

dataAtRestEncrypted.description: Indicates whether data at-rest encryption is enabled on Azure Stack HCI clustered volumes.

dataInTransitProtected.description: Indicates whether HCI cluster has data in-transit protection.

lastUpdated.description: Time in UTC when compliance status was last updated.

properties.description: Update summaries properties

location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

systemData.description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

provisioningState.description: Provisioning state of the UpdateSummaries proxy resource. Indicates the current lifecycle status of the update summary operation, such as whether it has been accepted, is in progress, or has completed.

packageVersions.description: Current version of each updatable component.

currentVersion.description: Current Solution Bundle version of the stamp.

currentSbeVersion.description: Current Sbe version of the stamp.

lastUpdated.description: Last time an update installation completed successfully.

lastChecked.description: Last time the update service successfully checked for updates

healthState.description: Overall health state for update-specific health checks.

healthCheckResult.description: An array of pre-check result objects.

healthCheckDate.description: Last time the package-specific checks were run.

state.description: Overall update state of the stamp. Indicates the current status of update deployment across the stamp, including preparation, application, and any issues encountered.

lastUpdated.description: Last time this component was updated.

name.description: Name of the individual test/rule/alert that was executed. Unique, not exposed to the customer.

displayName.description: The health check DisplayName localized of the individual test executed.

tags.description: Key-value pairs that allow grouping/filtering individual tests.

healthCheckTags.description: Key-value pairs that allow grouping/filtering individual tests.

title.description: User-facing name; one or more sentences indicating the direct issue.

status.description: Represents the current status of the check being performed. Indicates whether the check has completed successfully, failed, or is still in progress.

severity.description: Indicates the importance or impact level of the result. Determines whether the result is informational, a warning, or a critical issue that may block updates.

description.description: Detailed overview of the issue and what impact the issue has on the stamp.

remediation.description: Set of steps that can be taken to resolve the issue found.

targetResourceID.description: The unique identifier for the affected resource (such as a node or drive).

targetResourceName.description: The name of the affected resource.

targetResourceType.description: The type of resource being referred to (well-known set of nouns in infrastructure, aligning with Monitoring).

timestamp.description: The time in which the HealthCheck was called.

additionalData.description: Property bag of key value pairs for additional information.

healthCheckSource.description: The name of the services called for the HealthCheck (I.E. Test-AzureStack, Test-Cluster).

key.description: Key that allow grouping/filtering individual tests.

value.description: Value of the key that allow grouping/filtering individual tests.

properties.description: Update properties

location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

systemData.description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

provisioningState.description: Provisioning state of the Updates proxy resource. Indicates the current lifecycle status of the update operation, such as whether it has been accepted, is in progress, or has completed.

installedDate.description: Date that the update was installed.

minSbeVersionRequired.description: Minimum Sbe Version of the update.

state.description: Represents the current state of the update as it relates to this stamp. This includes phases such as preparation, installation, scanning, and error handling, providing insight into the update's progress and any issues encountered.

prerequisites.description: If update State is HasPrerequisite, this property contains an array of objects describing prerequisite updates before installing this update. Otherwise, it is empty.

componentVersions.description: An array of component versions for a Solution Bundle update, and an empty array otherwise.

rebootRequired.description: Indicates whether a reboot is required after the update or operation. Helps determine if a system restart is necessary to complete the process.

healthState.description: Overall health state for update-specific health checks.

healthCheckDate.description: Last time the package-specific checks were run.

packagePath.description: Path where the update package is available.

packageSizeInMb.description: Size of the package. This value is a combination of the size from update metadata and size of the payload that results from the live scan operation for OS update content.

releaseLink.description: Link to release notes for the update.

availabilityType.description: Indicates how the update content is made available for download. This determines whether the update is sourced locally, from an online repository, or requires user notification.

additionalProperties.description: Extensible KV pairs serialized as a string. This is currently used to report the stamp OEM family and hardware model information when an update is flagged as Invalid for the stamp based on OEM type.

updateStateProperties.description: Additional information regarding the state of the update. See definition of UpdateStateProperties type below for more details on this property.

progressPercentage.description: Progress percentage of ongoing operation. Currently this property is only valid when the update is in the Downloading state, where it maps to how much of the update content has been downloaded.

notifyMessage.description: Brief message with instructions for updates of AvailabilityType Notify.

properties.description: Describes Update Run Properties.

location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

systemData.description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

provisioningState.description: Provisioning state of the UpdateRuns proxy resource. Indicates the current lifecycle status of the update operation, such as whether it has been accepted, is in progress, or has completed.

timeStarted.description: Timestamp of the update run was started.

lastUpdatedTime.description: Timestamp of the most recently completed step in the update run.

state.description: Represents the current state of the update run. Indicates whether the update is in progress, has completed successfully, failed, or is in an unknown state.

progress.description: Progress representation of the update run steps.

description.description: More detailed description of the step.

errorMessage.description: Error message, specified if the step is in a failed state.

status.description: Status of the step, bubbled up from the ECE action plan for installation attempts. Values are: 'Success', 'Error', 'InProgress', and 'Unknown status'.

startTimeUtc.description: When the step started, or empty if it has not started executing.

endTimeUtc.description: When the step reached a terminal state.

lastUpdatedTimeUtc.description: Completion time of this step or the last completed sub-step.

expectedExecutionTime.description: Expected execution time of a given step. This is optionally authored in the update action plan and can be empty.

steps.description: Recursive model for child steps of this step.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

startTimeUtc.description: The UTC date and time at which the job started.

endTimeUtc.description: The UTC date and time at which the job completed.

percentComplete.description: The percentage of the job that is complete.

logCollectionSessionDetails.description: Details of the log collection session.

reportedProperties.description: Reported Properties for Download Os job

jobType.description: Job Type to support polymorphic resource.

target.description: Target operating system to support polymorphic resource.

osImageLocation.description: Location of the operating system image.

vsrVersion.description: Validated Solution Recipe version to be used for the job

imageHash.description: Hash of the OS package downloaded

gpgPubKey.description: GPG Public Key used for package verification

percentComplete.description: The percentage of the job that is complete.

reportedProperties.description: Reported Properties for Provision Os job

jobType.description: Job Type to support polymorphic resource.

target.description: Target operating system to support polymorphic resource.

customConfiguration.description: Base64 encoded custom configuration for CAPI to use

type.description: Type of the onboarding resource to support polymorphic resource.

jobType.description: Job Type to support polymorphic resource.

percentComplete.description: The percentage of the job that is complete.

nodeSettings.description: Optional settings for configuring the node for remote support.

sessionDetails.description: Details of the remote support session.

state.description: The state of the remote support node.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the node settings were created, in UTC.

updatedAt.description: The timestamp when the node settings were last updated, in UTC.

connectionStatus.description: The current connection status of the remote support session.

connectionErrorMessage.description: The error message, if any, from the last connection attempt.

validatedSolutionRecipeVersion.description: Represents validated solution recipe version of a os image.

composedImageVersion.description: Represents composed image version of a os image.

composedImageIsoUrl.description: Represents composed image iso download url of a os image.

composedImageIsoHash.description: Represents composed image iso hash of a os image.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

systemData.description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

validatedSolutionRecipeVersion.description: Represents validated solution recipe version of a platform update.

platformVersion.description: Represents version of a platform update.

platformPayloads.description: Represents the platform payloads of a platform update.

payloadUrl.description: Represents url of a platform update payload.

payloadHash.description: Represents hash of a platform update payload.

payloadPackageSizeInBytes.description: Represents size in bytes of a platform update payload.

payloadIdentifier.description: Represents identifier of a platform update payload.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

systemData.description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

updatePayloads.description: Represents the payloads of a update content resource.

url.description: Represents url of a update payload.

hash.description: Represents hash of a update payload.

hashAlgorithm.description: Represents hash algorithm of a update payload.

identifier.description: Represents identifier of a update payload.

packageSizeInBytes.description: Represents size in bytes of a update payload.

group.description: Represents the group of a update payload.

fileName.description: Represents the file name of a update payload.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

systemData.description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

recipeContent.description: Represents contents of a validated solution recipe.

signature.description: Represents the signature of the recipe, to be used for ensuring its integrity.

info.description: Represents information about a validated solution recipe.

capabilities.description: Represents capabilities available in a validated solution recipe.

components.description: Represents components available in a validated solution recipe.

solutionType.description: Represents the solution type for which this validated solution recipe is applicable.

version.description: Represents the version for which this validated solution recipe is applicable.

identifier.description: Represents the unique identifier of the payload used to query the URL.

hash.description: Represents the cryptographic hash of the payload, ensuring data integrity.

fileName.description: Represents the name of the file associated with the payload.

url.description: Represents the URL from which the payload can be downloaded.

publisher.description: Represents the publisher of the extension.

enableAutomaticUpgrade.description: Indicates whether automatic upgrades of the extension are enabled.

lcmUpdate.description: Indicates whether the LCM (Lifecycle Management) update of the extension is enabled.

catalog.description: Specifies the catalog to which the extension belongs.

ring.description: Specifies the ring to which the extension belongs, internally used by component.

releaseTrain.description: Specifies the release train to which given component belongs.

link.description: Specifies the link associated with the extension.

name.description: Specifies the name of the extension.

expectedHash.description: Specifies the expected hash of the extension.

previewSource.description: Specifies the preview source of the extension.

publisherId.description: Identifier of the Publisher for the offer

content.description: JSON serialized catalog content of the offer

contentVersion.description: The API version of the catalog service used to serve the catalog content

catalogPlanId.description: Identifier of the CatalogPlan for the sku
